proficiencies: Proficient with Light Armors and Weapons.
Proficient with Light Armors and Weapons.
Proficient with Light Armors and Weapons.

swashbucker: For your check that has or is against a card that has the Finesse trait, you gain the skill Melee: Dexterity +2.
If your check has the Swashbuckling trait, you may reroll 1 die on your check; you must take the second result.
If your check has the Swashbuckling trait (or is a check to defeat a ship), you may reroll 1 die on your check; you must take the second result.
If your check has the Swashbuckling trait, you may reroll 1 die (or 2 dice) on your check; you must take the second result.
If your check has the Swashbuckling trait (or is a check to defeat a ship), you may reroll 1 die (or 2 dice) on your check; you must take the second result.
Reduce Structural damage to your ship by 1.
pirate_queen: For your check that has or is against a card that has the Finesse trait, you gain the skill Melee: Dexterity +2.
If your check has the Swashbuckling trait, you may reroll 1 die on your check; you must take the second result.
If your check has the Swashbuckling trait (or is a check to defeat a ship), you may reroll 1 die on your check; you must take the second result.
If your check has the Swashbuckling trait, you may reroll 1 die (or 2 dice) on your check; you must take the second result.
If your check has the Swashbuckling trait (or is a check to defeat a ship), you may reroll 1 die (or 2 dice) on your check; you must take the second result.
Reduce Structural damage to your ship by 1.
Reduce Structural damage to your ship by (2).
You gain the skill Diplomacy: Charisma +3.
You gain the skill Diplomacy (and Craft): Charisma +3.
When you acquire a card that has the Pirate or Swashbuckling trait, you may immediately explore again.
You may reveal a card that has the Swashbuckling trait to add the Swashbuckling trait to your check.
If you are on a ship, you may move at the end of that character's turn.
If you are on a ship, you (or another character on the ship) may move at the end of that character's turn.
duelist: For your check that has or is against a card that has the Finesse trait, you gain the skill Melee: Dexterity +2.
For your check that has or is against a card that has the Finesse trait, you gain the skill Melee: Dexterity (+3).
If your check has the Swashbuckling trait, you may reroll 1 die on your check; you must take the second result.
If your check has the Swashbuckling trait (or is a check to defeat a ship), you may reroll 1 die on your check; you must take the second result.
If your check has the Swashbuckling trait, you may reroll 1 die (or 2 dice) on your check; you must take the second result.
If your check has the Swashbuckling trait (or is a check to defeat a ship), you may reroll 1 die (or 2 dice) on your check; you must take the second result.
Reduce Structural damage to your ship by 1.
When you defeat a monster on your turn, and your check to defeat has the Swashbuckling trait, you may discard a card to immediately explore.
When you defeat a monster on your turn, and your check to defeat has the Swashbuckling trait, you may discard (or recharge) a card to immediately explore.
When you acquire a card that has the Finesse or Ranged trait, you may immediately recharge it to draw a card.
You may recharge an ally to recharge a random card from your discard pile.
You may recharge an ally to recharge a random card (or a weapon of your choice) from your discard pile.
If any die rolled on your check is an 8 or higher, roll 1d4 and add it to the result.
